#Install packages
```{r install, echo = TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
devtools::install_github(repo = "KacperKorzen/RRestKorzeniewski")
```


## Test
```{r load, echo = TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
signal = RRestKorzeniewski::loadPPG("rrest-syn069_data.csv", path = '/Users/korzeniewski/Desktop/PRO/project1/', first_sample = 500, last_sample = 10800)

```

## Test
```{r calulate, echo = TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
respiration = ppgToResp(signal, 500);
respiration$graph

```

## Test
```{r RRV, echo = TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
respiration2 = calculateRespFeatures(resp = respiration)
respiration2$graph
cat('mRR: ', respiration2$mRR)
cat('stdRR: ', respiration2$stdRR)
cat('RMSSD: ', respiration2$RMSSD)
```
